basic.Peptide Name: RcAlb-PepII (designed in silico using as template the amino acid sequence of Rc-2S-Alb)
basic.Source: Synthetic construct (Rc-2S-Alb comes from Ricinus communis (Castor bean))
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.31678367] Gram-negative bacteria:E. coli (MIC50 = 31 μM, MIC90 = 29 μM, MBC > 250 μM), K. pneumoniae(MIC50 = 11 μM, MIC90 = 21 μM, MBC = 42 μM)Gram-positive bacteria:S. aureus (MIC50 = 79 μM, MIC90 > 250 μM, MBC > 250 μM)Yeast:C. albicans (MIC50 = 129 μM, MIC90 > 250 μM, MFC > 250 μM), C. parapsilosis (MIC50 = 9 μM, MIC90 = 17 μM, MFC = 25 μM), C. tropicalis (MIC50 = 29 μM, MIC90 = 28 μM, MFC = 67 μM)
